Posts.Content: She has had one breast removed thus far, but from what I understand, inflammatory breast cancer covers the chest area like a blanket, making it very difficult to remove.
Posts.Title: Inflammatory Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hello all, My friend has recently been diagnosed with breast cancer. Recently they took her off chemotherapy because it was damaging her heart. Do they often resume chemo after problems like this, or is this not a good sign for her? Thanks in advance for the help! LINK DELETED PER FORUM POLICIES -- PLEASE REVIEW. THANK YOU.
Posts.Title: Inflammatory Breast Cancer
